references: Schemes S1 and S2 in the Supporting Information

synthesis_conditions.notes: Reaction of 6 b did not produce the desired helicate, indicating specificity of the synthesis conditions to the starting material.

synthesis_conditions.attempt_details: Attempted synthesis from 6 b using NaBH4 in various solvents at different temperatures was unsuccessful.
synthesis_conditions.notes: The p-phenylene linkage of 6 b likely hinders spiroborate formation due to steric hindrance.
Formation of the 1:1 inclusion complex 3 aNa2·G1 was confirmed by various spectroscopic methods.

synthesis_conditions.method: Formation as diastereomeric salt with optically pure (R,R)- or (S,S)-7+·Br-
synthesis_conditions.further_conversion: Cation exchange with achiral tetrabutylammonium bromide (TBA+ Br-)
synthesis_conditions.characterization: 1H NMR spectra in the presence of (1R,2S)-N-benzyl-N-methylephedrinium bromide as a chiral shift reagent
